channel.title: Blog on edouard.paris
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on edouard.paris

item.title: Leaving Twitter
item.description: I am leaving Twitter. Please do not contact/tag me on this network. 10 years ago, I signed up to twitter.com by curiosity. I immediatly loved the format, the RT and the hashtags. The requirement to be concise and the full public discussions were appealing to me. My first usage was to keep a technological watch, to discover new projects like new programming frameworks, and to be confronted to new scientific ideas.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: 1. About writing It is not easy. 2. About this website A static website was an evidence for me, I do not write enough to need a database and I have no abhorrence against editing configuration files. 2.1 Privacy This website has no javascript, no cookie, no tracker whatsoever. I do not spend time watching my caddy server logs and elaborate statistic about its visitors. I just want a little part of internet where a visitor can read content without no exchange of information.
